full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 201 of 228
LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct
1 THE COURT: You may.
2 BY MS. COMEY:
3 Q. Mr. Alessi, I want to talk some more about the massages that Jeffrey Epstein received at his Palm Beach house.
4 A. Okay.
5 Q. Did you see the people who came to the house to give Mr. Epstein massages during your employment?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. About what percentage of those people were female?
8 A. I would say 98 percent they were female.
9 Q. And when those females would come to Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach house to give him massages, which entry would they take -- would they use to get into the house?
10 A. If they were there for the first time, they will go through the front entrance, front door.
11 Q. Go ahead.
12 A. And if they were repeat visits, they will come through the kitchen always.
13 Q. And when a female came through the kitchen and was there to massage Jeffrey Epstein, where did they go from there based on your observations?
14 A. Based on my observation, they will stay in the kitchen, I will let Mr. Epstein know, Ms. Maxwell, that this person is here for a massage. And they will tell me, Okay. Set it up upstairs in his bathroom, Mr. Epstein's bathroom, or by the
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018074
